item.title: Household rubbish, 2nd November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Abbot Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Loose road paving slab, 2nd November
item.description:

item.title: Fireworks for sale flyposter on lamp column opp 436 Croydon Rd Beckenham at the junction with the War Memorial roundabout., 2nd November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 439, Croydon Road, Elmers End, London

item.title: Junction between Murray street, Augustines Road, and Agar Grove, 2nd November
item.description:
Street lights on the agar Grove bridge are still not working, despite the fact that the works were completed nearly 4 months ago. Zebra crossing lights outside of Nisa store not working either. This is hazardous and the council does not take action despite many messages highlighting this potential hazard. Please take action and fix our street lights.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St. Augustine's Road, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Short silver, square cross section cabinet fronting 1, Central Parade, High Street Penge. Tags on top surface, 2nd November
item.description:
Short silver, square cross section cabinet fronting 1, Central Parade, High Street Penge. Tags on top surface. This is situated on the public footway and so is likely to be related to Highways not the Record Shop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal Posters on Welling corner advertising nearby firework shop, 2nd November
